name: Time Relapse
description:
'This is my entry for the One Minute Game Jam'

-- HOW TO PLAY --

A & D = Movement

Spacebar = Jump

Find the keys to unlock new paths find the platforms you can jump on from a table to a part of the fridge.

Will you Make your way to the Cloads and get the winning Key you dont have long lets say 60 seconds! 

Please leave feed back on the game still adding Audio and maybe Enemies to Destrupt the player! :D
